Constructor Detail

Spaceship

public Spaceship(int index,
                 double xLoc,
                 double yLoc,
                 int angle)
Initializes the location, speed, angle, and hit points of the spaceship.

Parameters:
index - The index of the player controlling this spaceship in the list of players.
xLoc - The starting x location of the spaceship.
yLoc - The starting y location of the spaceship.
angle - The starting angle of the spaceship.
Method Detail

Draw

public void Draw(java.awt.Graphics page)
Draws the spacehsip and its bullets onto the game window. The spaceship is shaped like the capital letter A, oriented in space. The x location and y location are in the center of the cross bar. The x tip and y tip are at the tip of the A. The points labeled (xCross1, yCross1) and (xCross2, yCross2) are at either end of the cross bar. The points labeled (xPoint1, yPoint1) and (xPoint2, yPoint2) are at the point of each leg of the A. Calculating the location of each point requires several calculations.

Parameters:
page - The page onto which all game objects are drawn.
